segments.text: I see you have bought the latest copy of “ beauty and fashion ” . Are there any interesting articles in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There ’ s an interesting interview with a top fashion designer about the latest fashions . I enjoyed reading her thought . The “ which ? ” section is very interesting this month . They tested facial cleaners . The article recommends “ all clear ” for effectiveness and price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to take the tests that they print in this magazine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know . Tests like ” how jealous are you ? ” and “ are you a fashion victim ? ”
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . I like to do those tests , too , but I don ’ t take them seriously .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not , but sometimes the results make you think about yourself and what you do . According to the jealousy test , I ’ m quite a jealous type of person . Perhaps I need to control my jealousy .
segments.speaker: S1
